/usr/bin/c++    -DCPP11_INITIALIZER_LIST -std=c++0x -DCPP11_AUTO -std=c++0x -DQGLVIEWER_FOUND -std=c++0x    CMakeFiles/display3DToOFF.dir/display3DToOFF.cpp.o  -o display3DToOFF -rdynamic -L/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/buildQGL ../../src/libDGtal.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lboost_program_options-mt -Wl,-Bdynamic -lqglviewer-qt4 -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lQtOpenGL -lQtGui -lQtXml -lQtCore -Wl,-rpath,/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/buildQGL:/home/anisbenyoub/Libraries/DGtal/buildQGL/src
